title: alternative to Americana that is CONDENSED?
content:
Hi,  
I was wondering if anyone could help me out. I 'm looking for a font that is close to Americana but that has a condensed style. As far as I can see, Americana's family only comes with an Extra Bold Condensed. Does anyone know of anything that looks like Americana regular but is condensed?  
Thanks!
author: RaizelDesign

comments.content: You can the similar font like "Americana" on dafont web site. I can give you the name is Typo 3. Hope you will like it.

Thanks Steve! I'm checking it out.  
Hmmm... wasn't quite what I was looking for, but it's a nice font and I'll keep it in mind for another project.
